name: service-card.toml

component.name: Service Card
component.description: Displays a care service option with icon, name and description for selection

props.service: { id: string, name: string, description: string, icon: string }

rawContent:
[component]
id = "service-card"
name = "Service Card"
description = "Displays a care service option with icon, name and description for selection"

[component.props]
service = "{ id: string, name: string, description: string, icon: string }"
onSelect = "(service) => void"
selected = "boolean (default: false)"

[component.features]
list = [
  "Service icon (dynamic from lucide-react)",
  "Service name",
  "Short description",
  "Selection state styling",
  "Click to select"
]

[component.styling]
hover = "border-cyan-300 cursor-pointer"
selected = "border-cyan-500 bg-cyan-50"
responsive = true

[component.usage]
code = """
import { ServiceCard } from '@prototype/components'

<ServiceCard
  service={{ id: 'caregiver', name: 'Caregiver', description: '...', icon: 'Heart' }}
  onSelect={(s) => setSelected(s)}
  selected={selectedId === 'caregiver'}
/>
"""

[relations]
entities = ["service"]
routes = ["client-home", "client-order-form"]

[implementation]
component = "ServiceCard"
file = "src/prototype/components/ServiceCard.tsx"
status = "planned"
